mapper.sql: id, order_no, sea_order_id, sea_order_no, cut_replenish_time, cabinet_number, paper_strip_seal, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_bill_of_lading, imp_and_exp_type, terms, port_departure_code, port_destination_code, good_time, is_freight_collect, is_other_expenses_paid, is_dangerous_goods, is_charged, transit_port_code, cabinet_type, cabinet_type_name,is_release_order
mapper.select: select sr.id,sr.order_no orderNo,sea_order_id seaOrderId,sea_order_no seaOrderNo, sr.cut_replenish_time cutReplenishTime,sr.cabinet_number cabinetNumber, sr.paper_strip_seal paperStripSeal,sr.create_user createUser,sr.create_time createTime, sr.update_user updateUser,sr.update_time updateTime,sr.is_bill_of_lading isBillOfLading, sr.is_release_order isReleaseOrder, sr.imp_and_exp_type impAndExpType,sr.terms, terms.name termsDesc, sr.port_departure_code portDepartureCode, sp.name portDepartureName, sr.port_destination_code portDestinationCode, sp1.name portDestinationName, sr.good_time goodTime,sr.is_freight_collect isFreightCollect, sr.is_other_expenses_paid isOtherExpensesPaid, sr.is_dangerous_goods isDangerousGoods,sr.is_charged isCharged, sr.transit_port_code transitPortCode, sp2.name transitPort, sr.cabinet_type cabinetType, sr.cabinet_type_name cabinetTypeName, sr.main_no,sr.sub_no,sr.bill_lading_weight from sea_replenishment sr left join sea_port sp on sr.port_departure_code = sp.code left join sea_port sp1 on sr.port_destination_code = sp1.code left join sea_port sp2 on sr.transit_port_code = sp2.code left join terms on sr.terms = terms.id where sr.id = #{orderId}
